svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 3 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 3, 2024" date: "2024-08-03"
Eth News and Links
Ethereum ninth anniversary of mainnet launch & Underhanded Solidity contest
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs - Execution (ACDE) #193 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : same
spec as devnet-1 (broken by EIP7702 testing), a few client issues found so far, wonâ€™t test EIP7702
EIP7702: latest spec will be included in pectra-devnet-3 EOF : working on fuzzing & writing tests
before adding to a devnet EIP6110 request objects encoding : hold off on changing from JSON to SSZ
Engine API engine_getBlobsV1 (CLs get blobs from EL): general support, decide at next ACDC RIP7212
secp256r1 precompile on L1 : review inclusion in a few months, champions need to help improve testing
Quantum resistance : need overall plan for Verkle, blobs & account abstraction, continue discussion on
cryptography channel in Eth R&D Discord Verkle: Trie alternatives : discuss on Verkle implementers
call, could swap out Verkle EIP7736 leaf-level state expiry proposal, slows state growth, could enable
in upgrade after Verkle EIP4444 Torrent prototype added EIP7463 proofs
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : same spec as devnet-1 (broken by EIP7702
testing), a few client issues found so far, wonâ€™t test EIP7702 EIP7702: latest spec will be included
in pectra-devnet-3 EOF : working on fuzzing & writing tests before adding to a devnet EIP6110 request
objects encoding : hold off on changing from JSON to SSZ Engine API engine_getBlobsV1 (CLs get blobs
from EL): general support, decide at next ACDC RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile on L1 : review inclusion
in a few months, champions need to help improve testing
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-2 : same spec as devnet-1 (broken by EIP7702 testing), a few client issues found so
far, wonâ€™t test EIP7702
Pectra-devnet-2 : same spec as devnet-1 (broken by EIP7702 testing), a few client issues found so far,
wonâ€™t test EIP7702
â€¢ EIP7702: latest spec will be included in pectra-devnet-3
EIP7702: latest spec will be included in pectra-devnet-3
â€¢ EOF : working on fuzzing & writing tests before adding to a devnet
EOF : working on fuzzing & writing tests before adding to a devnet
â€¢ EIP6110 request objects encoding : hold off on changing from JSON to SSZ
EIP6110 request objects encoding : hold off on changing from JSON to SSZ
â€¢ Engine API engine_getBlobsV1 (CLs get blobs from EL): general support, decide at next ACDC
Engine API engine_getBlobsV1 (CLs get blobs from EL): general support, decide at next ACDC
â€¢ RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile on L1 : review inclusion in a few months, champions need to help
improve testing
RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile on L1 : review inclusion in a few months, champions need to help improve
testing
â€¢ Quantum resistance : need overall plan for Verkle, blobs & account abstraction, continue discussion
on cryptography channel in Eth R&D Discord
cryptography channel in Eth R&D Discord
â€¢ Verkle: Trie alternatives : discuss on Verkle implementers call, could swap out Verkle EIP7736
leaf-level state expiry proposal, slows state growth, could enable in upgrade after Verkle
Verkle:
â€¢ Trie alternatives : discuss on Verkle implementers call, could swap out Verkle
Trie alternatives : discuss on Verkle implementers call, could swap out Verkle
â€¢ EIP7736 leaf-level state expiry proposal, slows state growth, could enable in upgrade after Verkle
EIP7736 leaf-level state expiry proposal, slows state growth, could enable in upgrade after Verkle
â€¢ EIP4444 Torrent prototype added EIP7463 proofs
EIP4444
â€¢ Torrent prototype added EIP7463 proofs
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ Future of EOA/AA breakout #6 : EIP7702 (execution abstraction for EOAs) converging on final spec for
Pectra, wonâ€™t include migration to contract wallets, additional features would need separate EIPs
â€¢ EIP7702 (execution abstraction for EOAs) converging on final spec for Pectra, wonâ€™t include
migration to contract wallets, additional features would need separate EIPs
Osaka + F starname upgrade
â€¢ Verkle implementers call #22 : Witness size could be reduced by 50%, fixes to EIP7612 & EIP-6800 and
EIP7748 created for state migration from Merkle Patricia Tree to Verkle
â€¢ Witness size could be reduced by 50%, fixes to EIP7612 & EIP-6800 and EIP7748 created for state
migration from Merkle Patricia Tree to Verkle
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Geth state history databases overview : ethdb, triedb, hashdb, pathdb & statedb
Geth state history databases overview : ethdb, triedb, hashdb, pathdb & statedb
â€¢ Builder playground : locally test a builder with MEV-Boost-Relay, Lighthouse & Reth
Builder playground : locally test a builder with MEV-Boost-Relay, Lighthouse & Reth
â€¢ Terence: Inclusion list timing constraints , no perfect design due to trade offs within a slot
Terence: Inclusion list timing constraints , no perfect design due to trade offs within a slot
â€¢ EIP7732 ePBS breakout #6 : No spec changes, Prysm implementation in progress with Lodestar starting
& discussion on slot auctions
EIP7732 ePBS breakout #6 :
â€¢ No spec changes, Prysm implementation in progress with Lodestar starting & discussion on slot
auctions
Research
â€¢ Restaking risks framework , quantify conditions that validators can be reused across multiple
services
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.7.0 : beacon API improvements and fixes
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Nimbus v24.7.0 : beacon API improvements and fixes
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.7.1 : adds experimental parallel transaction execution with 25-45% block
processing improvement Erigon: Otterscan v2.6.0 alpha : dark mode, ABI guessing of non-verified
contracts via WhatsABI and option to broadcast raw transactions
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v24.7.1 : adds experimental parallel transaction execution with 25-45% block processing
improvement
Besu v24.7.1 : adds experimental parallel transaction execution with 25-45% block processing
â€¢ Erigon: Otterscan v2.6.0 alpha : dark mode, ABI guessing of non-verified contracts via WhatsABI and
option to broadcast raw transactions
Erigon:
â€¢ Otterscan v2.6.0 alpha : dark mode, ABI guessing of non-verified contracts via WhatsABI and option
to broadcast raw transactions
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): Interface EIP7749 : Add wallet_signIntendedValidatorData
method EIP7212 secp256r1 precompile deleted (previously moved to RIP7212 )
â€¢ Interface EIP7749 : Add wallet_signIntendedValidatorData method
Interface EIP7749 : Add wallet_signIntendedValidatorData method
â€¢ EIP7212 secp256r1 precompile deleted (previously moved to RIP7212 )
EIP7212 secp256r1 precompile deleted (previously moved to RIP7212 )
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Underhanded Solidity contest : transient storage theme, deadline August 31
Underhanded Solidity contest : transient storage theme, deadline August 31
â€¢ Hardhat v2.22.7 : adds RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile support
Hardhat v2.22.7 : adds RIP7212 secp256r1 precompile support
â€¢ Remix v0.52 : updated Git plugin & URL to load a GitHub folder into Remix
Remix v0.52 : updated Git plugin & URL to load a GitHub folder into Remix
â€¢ Brock: Interval addition in Solidity
Brock: Interval addition in Solidity
â€¢ EVMRepl : adds multi file support & load contract by address
EVMRepl : adds multi file support & load contract by address
â€¢ Coinbase OnchainKit Transaction React component: wraps transaction flow
Coinbase OnchainKit Transaction React component: wraps transaction flow
â€¢ smlXL sim : create APIs & webhooks using real time onchain data
smlXL sim : create APIs & webhooks using real time onchain data
Security
â€¢ Convergence Finance $200k exploit via lack of input validation, code removed post audit for gas
optimization
Ecosystem
â€¢ Ethereum ninth anniversary of mainnet launch Lefteris names the faces in the launch photo
Ethereum ninth anniversary of mainnet launch
â€¢ Lefteris names the faces in the launch photo
â€¢ Devcon: Speaker application deadline extended to August 4 Community hubs proposals wanted
Devcon:
â€¢ Speaker application deadline extended to August 4
Speaker application deadline extended to August 4
â€¢ Community hubs proposals wanted
Community hubs proposals wanted
â€¢ Etherscan funded by : view address & transaction that funded an EOA
Etherscan funded by : view address & transaction that funded an EOA
Job Listings
â€¢ Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
â€¢ EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
EF seek a European/Civil Law qualified Legal Counsel
â€¢ Nethermind: Senior Device Security Engineer , Senior DevOps Engineer AMER & APAC , Full Stack Lead
APAC, Post-Grad Internship & App Security Engineer
Nethermind: Senior Device Security Engineer , Senior DevOps Engineer AMER & APAC , Full Stack Lead
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.8 to 53.8 gwei, 4.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.7
gwei 14k ETH net issuance this week

â€¢ Gas: 0.8 to 53.8 gwei, 4.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.7 gwei
Gas: 0.8 to 53.8 gwei, 4.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.7 gwei
â€¢ 14k ETH net issuance this week
14k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,960 - $3,391, currently $2,963, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,960 - $3,391, currently $2,963, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Compound agrees to staked COMP product in exchange for Humpy canceling proposal
Compound agrees to staked COMP product in exchange for Humpy canceling proposal
â€¢ Synthetix USDx (collateralized stablecoin) on Arbitrum, 0% interest borrowing
Synthetix USDx (collateralized stablecoin) on Arbitrum, 0% interest borrowing
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Jonathan Mann (Song a Day) is suing the SEC to clarify sale of NFT art isnâ€™t an unregistered
security

General
â€¢ Ferrari exec foiled deepfake audio ; Reminder: ask security questions
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
